outfit_description: Teen boy wearing baby blue baseball cap, navy blue hoodie with a lighter navycrew neck t shirt, slim fit black jeans and navy sneakers
Oakland Technical H.S:
{In order to prepare students for the demands of a professional or working environment}

{Hoods, hats, etc. must leave eyes and ears visible}
Trinity: {Students should refrain from wearing hats or visors.}
Booker T. Washington High School: {Headgear is prohibited and must be kept out of sight in the building. This includes, but is not limited to caps, hats, hoods, bandanas, wave caps, sweatbands, sunglasses, or any other head covering}

outfit_description: Teen girl with long black hair wearing a taupe colored crop top that cuts off at the shoulders and midsection, blue jeans with rips above and below the knew, a belt, and taupe colored flip flops.
Oakland Technical H.S: {Clothing may not expose the midriff when a student is standing}
Trinity: {Stomachs, chests, buttocks, and undergarments must be covered.}
Booker T. Washington High School:
{Blouses/shirts that expose any portion of the waist, cleavage, hips, or midriff are not allowed}

{Health regulations and safety factors require that shoes be worn at all times at school (bedroom shoes, athletic sandals, flip flops, and slides are not allowed)}
Riverdale High School:
{At a minimum, clothing selected for school must cover students from their shoulders to mid-thigh. (Midthigh is measured by observing the point where the student's index finger extends when the student is standing with his/her arms at their side}

{strapless tops, sheer garments, off-theshoulder tops, and skirts or shorts shorter than mid-thigh are prohibited}
Denver School of the Arts: {clothing that bares or exposes the stomach, back, breasts, buttocks, or genitalia. (For example, the following items are prohibited under this section: garments made of fishnet, mesh, or similar material, and midriffs, halter tops, backless clothing, tube tops. Muscle tops, revealing tank tops or sundresses, etc.)}

outfit_description: Teen girl with a curly black bob hairstyle and glasses in a black long sleeve velour top, with a wrist band on each wrist, white coffin shapped nails, plaid pants with a black belt, and white sneakers.
Booker T. Washington High School: {No tights, leggings and/or jeggings are allowed}

Duval Charter School at Baymeadows:
{All shirts must be tucked in and purchased from (All Uniform Wear) with the school’s logo.}

{ALL CLOTHING SHOULD BE LABELED WITH THE STUDENTS NAME.}

outfit_description: Boy in grey hoodie, with a black and red patterned belt, jeans torn at the knee and black and white sneakers
Trinity: {Clothing must be clean, tidy, and in good repair.} (NOTE: Maybe they'd say ripped jeans okay)
Booker T. Washington High School: {There should be no rips or holes above mid-thigh.}
Riverdale High School: {Clothing must be clean and in good repair.} (NOTE: Maybe they'd say ripped jeans are in good repair)
Seattle Preparatory School:
{Clothing and personal grooming must be neat, clean and modest}
